We hosted our daughter's wedding here. It was a beautiful location (on a perfect summer day). I couldn't imagine anything nicer. The staff was easy to work with
We like stopping at museum's in small towns, it gives us an idea of what was important to that area. This museum was put together very nicely. Lot's of fun stuff.

First time there and it was really very good, lots of local information and some really good displays, worth a visit, I shall certainly go back.
Understand the museum has undergone some upgrades. Check if it open before you go on a Sunday. Don't miss the Variel Home Tour.
